text_block.p1: I have 3 years of experience as a service center Manager in the office, as well as five years of remote work experience as a content Manager. During his time working on outsourcing, he increased his expertise in related areas: <u>seo</u>, <u>smm</u>.
text_block.p2: From web development I chose â€“ backend. The technology stack I'm using at the moment: PHP7, MySQL, JavaScript (jQuery), aJax.
text_block.p3: Also have good knowledge of CMS WordPress. Now I study the information in order to determine, which framework to work with, I tend to Laravel.
text_block.p4: From auxiliary technologies I use <u>git</u>, for Assembly of projects I began to use <u>gulp&webpack</u>. Also, had experience with <u>docker</u>.
text_block.p5: P.S. If you have any questions, and perhaps there are questions ;), happy to answer them. In messengers, I answer a little faster than on facebook or by mail.
